title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 550.5 - Commission requirements consolidated
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 550.5 - Commission requirements consolidated

State Regulations

It is the purpose and effect of this Part to contain all of
the water quality requirements of the commission, whether in force because
expressly set forth in the Tri-State Compact or in force because adopted by the
commission pursuant to the provision of the compact variously known as article
XVII or article VII.3. Accordingly, requirements contained in the compact and
still in force are repeated in this Part and made part hereof. In accordance
with article XVII or article VII.3 of the compact, the other provisions of this

Part are in addition to or in substitution for requirements previously in
force. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
550.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
